item.description:
Greetings,

You are invited to the Boston Area Law of Attraction group meeting. Please join the group and meet with other New England area people who are interested in practicing the science and ideology of The Law of Attraction.

We meet on the first Tuesday of each month at 7pm.
I have a central location in downtown Boston and will host our meetups.

I am looking forward to meeting each of you and exploring these life changing ways of thinking.

Dave

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Law of Attraction March Meetup
